databaseControl

Class GameDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • databaseControl.GameDownloader

  • public class GameDownloader
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String gamesListUrl
      Part of the non-public api url of Steam, returns a json object containing the title and appId of every artifact on Steam.
      static java.lang.String individualGameDataUrl
      Part of the non-public api url of Steam, returns data (unfortunately not including tags) about the game in json format.
      static java.lang.String individualGamePageUrl
      Url to the user page of a game.
      static int MaxDownload
      Set the max number of games to download from the steam.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameDownloader()
      Standard constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> DownloadGameData(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> appids)
      Downloads the data to be stored later from Steam.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> GetAppids()
      Uses the gamesListUrl to download all the appIds from Steam.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> GetTagsForGame(int appid)
      Returns a String list containing all tags connected to the game appId.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • gamesListUrl

        public static final java.lang.String gamesListUrl
        Part of the non-public api url of Steam, returns a json object containing the title and appId of every artifact on Steam.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • individualGameDataUrl

        public static final java.lang.String individualGameDataUrl
        Part of the non-public api url of Steam, returns data (unfortunately not including tags) about the game in json format. An appid needs to be appended to the end before using.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • individualGamePageUrl

        public static final java.lang.String individualGamePageUrl
        Url to the user page of a game. Used to gather tags for the game. An appId needs to be appended to the end before using.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MaxDownload

        public static int MaxDownload
        Set the max number of games to download from the steam. These downloads might take a few minutes. Set to -1 for all games. Default value is 100.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameDownloader

        public GameDownloader()
        Standard constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • GetAppids

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> GetAppids()
        Uses the gamesListUrl to download all the appIds from Steam.
        Returns:
        Integer list containing all the appIds returned from Steam.

      • DownloadGameData

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> DownloadGameData(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> appids)
        Downloads the data to be stored later from Steam. Creates a String list, where each entry is an rdf triplet in the same format as used by DatabaseManager. The data returned currently includes title, metascore, category, tags and type
        Parameters:
        appids -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        DatabaseManager

      • GetTagsForGame

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> GetTagsForGame(int appid)
        Returns a String list containing all tags connected to the game appId. This data is not available on an Steam api, so the user friendly game page is opened, and a built in regex expression is used to extract the tags from the webpage. Example page
        Parameters:
        appid - The appId of the game for which the tags will be downloaded.
        Returns:
        A String list containing all the tags.
